org.apache.mesos.storage

Interface Persister

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CuratorPersister

    public interface Persister
    This interface should be implemented in order to store and fetch data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes this storage and cleans up any resources.
      void delete(java.lang.String path)
      Deletes the data at the specified path, or throws an exception if the data didn't already exist.
      byte[] get(java.lang.String path)
      Retrieves the previously stored data at the specified path, or throws an exception if the data is missing.
      java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getChildren(java.lang.String path)
      Returns the names of child nodes at the provided path.
      void set(java.lang.String path, byte[] bytes)
      Writes a single value to storage at the specified path, replacing existing data at the path if any.
      void setMany(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,byte[]> pathBytesMap)
      Atomically writes many values to storage at once.

      • getChildren

        java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getChildren(java.lang.String path)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the names of child nodes at the provided path. The returned values may be joined with the provided path to get their full paths.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • close

        void close()
        Closes this storage and cleans up any resources. No other operations should be performed against this instance after calling close().
